name: weav_spawn_03
text: The threads of fate are mine to weave.
text_simple: the threads of fate are mine to weave

name: weav_spawn_04
text: The loom weaves and a new pattern appears.
text_simple: the loom weaves and a new pattern appears

name: weav_cast_02
text: Caught in your own life's thread.

name: weav_ability_timelap_05
text: You thought you had me, didn't you?

name: weav_level_01
text: Ah, I see more of the pattern.

name: weav_kill_05
text: I'll thread the needle through your eyes.
text_simple: ill thread the needle through your eyes

name: weav_kill_06
text: Shuttle and loom, I weave your doom.
text_simple: shuttle and loom i weave your doom

name: weav_kill_09
text: To the loom with you, to be rewoven.

text: Who puts their skeleton on the inside?

text: That's no way to protect your vitals.

text: Our fates were woven from the first.
text_simple: our fates were woven from the first

name: weav_death_11
text: I hate to leave loose ends.

name: weav_fastres_01
text: There's a snag in your plans.

text: I'll weave a brighter pattern this time.

text: More fates for me to weave.

name: weav_respawn_05
text: The Loom weaves my life anew.
text_simple: the loom weaves my life anew

text: I must repair what came undone.
text_simple: i must repair what came undone

name: weav_respawn_10
text: My life by the Loom rewoven.
text_simple: my life by the loom rewoven

name: weav_rare_01
text: Few know their place in the cosmic weave. Fewer still can lay their claws upon the Loom and influence the pattern.
text_simple: few know their place in the cosmic weave fewer still can lay their claws upon the loom and influence the pattern

name: weav_rare_02
text: Fate weaves the threads of our lives together. Fate also wields the blade that cuts them short.
text_simple: fate weaves the threads of our lives together fate also wields the blade that cuts them short

name: weav_purch_02
text: It's all part of the pattern.
text_simple: its all part of the pattern
